Package a12345678.change.to.your.matriculation.number

Class MagicItem

Object
MagicItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
MagicEffectRealization, MagicSource, Tradeable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Potion, Scroll
public abstract class MagicItem extends Object implements Tradeable, MagicEffectRealization, MagicSource
MagicItems are items that can cause magic effects on other objects. So they are a source of magic. As items they can be traded and they also can be the target of magic effects

  • Method Details

    • getUsages

      public int getUsages()
      Returns value of usages (for access from deriving classes)
      Returns:
      value of instance variable usages

    • tryUsage

      public boolean tryUsage()
      If usages > 0 reduce usage by 1 and return true, otherwise return false
      Returns:
      returns true if usage is still possible

    • usageString

      public String usageString()
      Returns "use" if usages is equal to 1, "uses" otherwise
      Returns:
      "use" or "uses" depending on the value of usages

    • additionalOutputString

      public String additionalOutputString()
      returns empty string. Is overridden in deriving classes as needed
      Returns:
      ""

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Formats this object according to "['name'; 'weight' g; 'price' 'currencyString'; 'usages' 'usageString''additionalOutputString']" 'currencyString' is "Knut" if price is 1, "Knuts" otherwise e.g. (when additionalOutput() returns an empty string) "[Accio Scroll; 1 g; 1 Knut; 5 uses]" or "[Alohomora Scroll; 1 g; 10 Knuts; 1 use]"
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      "['name'; 'weight' g; 'price' 'currencyString'; 'usages' 'usageString''additionalOutputString']"

    • provideMana

      public boolean provideMana (MagicLevel levelNeeded, int amount)
      Always returns true; no Exceptions needed
      Specified by:
      provideMana in interface MagicSource
      Parameters:
      levelNeeded - mana can only be provided if the object at least has magic level levelNeeded
      amount - amount of mana to provide
      Returns:
      true, if mana could be successfully provided, false otherwise
